Text: Re Amendment IPG LTD Bahamas CO IPG SAK Kuwait Singapore Crude Financials K NonEFFT Cc I have changed the counterparty name as requested from Independent Petroleum Group Ltd CP ID Independent Petroleum Group Limited Bahamas CO Independent Petroleum Group SAK Kuwait The contact details are also in correctly Regards Paul Rikesh Patel To Enron Europe Global CounterParty cc New Counterparty Contacts Subject Amendment IPG LTD Bahamas CO IPG SAK Kuwait Singapore Crude Financials K NonEFFT Hi Guys I have had a letter from the above counterparty to amend its entity name Please can you amend it within GCP There is already IPG LTD within GCP which can be inactivated Thanks Ricky
Shell Coal Marketing Cc changed the name of Shell Coal Marketing CP ID to Angloa Coal Marketing Ltd as requested by Daniela de Lisi and confirmed by Neil Anderson Credit Regards Paul

Shell Coal Marketing Cc changed the name of Shell Coal Marketing CP ID to Anglo Coal Marketing Ltd as requested by Daniela de Lisi and confirmed by Neil Anderson Credit This email has been sent before The spelling in the email of Anglo was incorrect ERMS Code SHELLCOAMAR This will be remain the same Regards Paul

Merger New Name Eon Kraftwerke GmbH Cc Konventionelle Warmekraftwerke AG and PreussenElectra Kraftwerke AG and Co KG are now inactive on GCP system They have now merged and Formed Eon Kraftwerke GmbH Attached below is a fax confirming This This has also been confirmed by Neil Anderson and Anna Reich in Credit Regards Paul Paul de Canha To Stephen CT cc Subject Eon Kraftwerke GmbH Merger London Fax System To ECT MAILIN LON UK EU GlobalCP DB ECTLONLNECT cc Subject New fax received Likely sender You have received a new fax from The image contains pages
